name: Xtreme League
description:
Go snowboarding whenever you like, regardless of the weather outside the window! Learn new tracks, get points and renew your board! Xtreme League is waiting for you!

Dreaming of snow slopes? Then this game is for you! Snowboard, try various tracks, compete with friends! You surely like our race modes! You can choose the race of your mood. What will it be today? Downhill race with time? Or full maneuver race with control points? You decide!Features:
  • Several modes of descents;
  • Many tasks on the slope;
  • A variety of skins for your board.
